availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Henry W. Hall (Powell County, Kentucky, farmer)

body.p: Powell County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Married to Lucinda Hall. Father of Elizabeth Hall, Sarah Hall, Bazel Hall, Lucy E. Hall, Mary Hall, George A. Hall, Philip Hall, and Elin Hall. Farmer in Powell County in 1850 and 1860.

bibl.p: Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Montgomery County, District 2, p. 53. Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Powell County, p. 20. Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Powell County, Precinct 2, Subdivision 144, p. 21.
